name: MindBreaker
description:
'W', 'A', 'S' and 'D' to move, use the mouse to aim.

Your task is to make it to the end of the level before losing all your lives. However, the more enemies around you, the less sane you become with the risk of losing control of your character for a period of time.

Watch out, you have limited ammo and enemies can hear your gun shots!
